title: Internal Probe Finds No Wrongdoing at Pennsylvania Pension System
sub_head: Investigators from Womble Bond Dickinson blame investment consultant Aon for misreporting returns for the Pennsylvania Public School Employees’ Retirement System
body:
An internal investigation has cleared the investment staff and now-retired senior executives of Pennsylvania’s largest pension of wrongdoing in miscalculating investment results near the end of 2020, an error that unleashed months of turmoil at the Pennsylvania Public School Employees’ Retirement System.
In the wake of that miscalculation, the pension system has come under federal scrutiny and several top executives have left.
